name: urlparam-gtm
description: Sistema de captura de parâmetros para Google Tag Manager

scripts.test: echo '🧪 Executando testes...' && node -c versao_atual_GTM.js && echo '✅ Testes passaram!'
scripts.test:html: echo '🔍 Verificando HTML...' && for file in *.html; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then echo "Verificando $file..."; if grep -q '<!DOCTYPE html>' "$file" && grep -q '<html' "$file" && grep -q '</html>' "$file"; then echo "✅ $file - OK"; else echo "❌ $file - Inválido"; exit 1; fi; fi; done
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Build iniciado...' && mkdir -p dist && cp *.html *.js *.md dist/ && echo '✅ Build concluído!'
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && echo '🚀 Deploy preview pronto em ./dist/'

author: Cliente Trinks
